entries.do_not_edit: The English version of this file (event_perk_racing.stf) is automatically generated by the SwgConversationEditor.
entries.s_17: Greetings, I'm the coordinator for this race course. You are not authorized to participate. Thank you.
entries.s_1cd82216: Get ready... I'll start the timer when you say go!
entries.s_22: Your results are still being uploaded.
entries.s_24: You will need to be invited to %TO's story.
entries.s_2492930f: I'd like to see who holds the current record for this track.
entries.s_4b4fb2b7: A series of waypoints will appear one after the other. Head to each waypoint as quickly as possible. When you arrive back here, talk to me again and I'll register your last time for this track.
entries.s_6a5b9858: The clock is ticking, get moving!
entries.s_ac51e630: Greetings, I'm the coordinator for this race course. If you'd like to race the track, just let me know. How may I serve you today?
entries.s_c0918d6: No hurry. Let me know when you're ready.
entries.s_d900d1be: I need to abort this race.
entries.s_dffdee4b: I'd like to give this track a try.
